sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS u_no
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = :P1 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET user_fname = :P1 /* {{$_POST.name}} */, user_type = :P2 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */, u_status = :P3 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, updated_by = :P4 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, scheme_id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.scheme_id}} */, aadhar_no = :P7 /* {{$_POST.aadhar}} */, pan_no = :P8 /* {{$_POST.pan}} */, address = :P9 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, pin = :P10 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, state = :P11 /* {{$_POST.state}} */, district = :P12 /* {{$_POST.district}} */
WHERE id = :P13 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

UPDATE t_scheme_user
SET scheme1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme0}} */, scheme2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme1}} */, scheme3 = :P3 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme2}} */, scheme4 = :P4 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme3}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, for_user_type = '2'
WHERE user_id = :P7 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

UPDATE t_scheme_user
SET scheme1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme0}} */, scheme2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme1}} */, scheme3 = :P3 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme2}} */, scheme4 = :P4 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme3}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, for_user_type = '3'
WHERE user_id = :P7 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

db:notexists.message: Mobile No. already exists in database.

sql.query:
INSERT INTO m_users
(user_id, user_fname, user_mobile, user_email, password, salt, user_type, u_status, created_by, created_on, user_lname, cap_amt, balance_amt, balance_outstanding, aeps_balance, scheme_id, aadhar_no, pan_no, address, pin, state, district, blank1, blank2) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UniqueID}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.name}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.email.lowercase()}} */, :P5 /* {{password.sha256(NOW)}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */, '1', :P8 /* {{identity}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW}} */, :P10 /* {{'https://github.com/ado.png'}} */, '0', '0', '0', '0', :P11 /* {{$_POST.scheme_id}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.aadhar}} */, :P13 /* {{$_POST.pan}} */, :P14 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, :P15 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, :P16 /* {{$_POST.state}} */, :P17 /* {{$_POST.district}} */, :P18 /* {{password}} */, :P19 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */)

INSERT INTO t_scheme_user
(user_id, scheme1, scheme2, scheme3, scheme4, created_by, created_on, for_user_type) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme0}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme1}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme2}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme3}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, '2')

INSERT INTO t_scheme_user
(user_id, scheme1, scheme2, scheme3, scheme4, created_by, created_on, for_user_type) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme0}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme1}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme2}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme3}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, '3')
